name: Incremental Epic Breakers - Beta version
description:
Thank you for playing Incremental Epic Breakers (IEB).
We are Japanese game developers, Hapiwaku Project!

<<CAUTION>> This is the Beta version.
The save file in Beta version won't be available in the official version.  
Some or many parts of the contents, game balance, settings and concepts might be changed in the official version. 
The cache save is now under construction, so please local save regularly.

We are in active developing for the official release step by step. We are so glad to hear your feedback! Please join our Discord and get in touch with us!

IEBをプレイしていただきありがとうございます！
<<注意>> このゲームはβ版です。
β版でのセーブデータを正式版で使うことはできません。正式版では、一部のコンテンツやゲームバランスなどが大幅に変わる可能性があります。
また、キャッシュセーブ（Cache Save）は工事中なので、ローカルセーブ/ロードを利用してください。

Instructions:
- "Space" to boost
- "Arrow" or "WASD" to boost in that direction
- ”R” to rotate the craft
- "C" on a craft to lock it
- "L" to lock the information
- "Z" for x5, "Shift" for x10, "Ctrl" for x100
- "1" to "7" to switch menus
- "Tab" to switch the menu tier

Our another game, Incremental Epic Hero (IEH) 
Kongregate: https://www.kongregate.com/games/hapiwakuproject/incremental-epic-hero
Armor Games: https://armorgames.com/incremental-epic-hero-game/19011
